      • main

      • readStrings

        public static java.util.List<java.lang.String> readStrings(java.io.File file,
                                                           int minLength)
        Reads all 2-byte (Unicode) and 1-byte (ASCII) based character-strings contained in the file. Only printable ASCII characters are determined as string.

        Parameters:
        file - the file that is to be searched for strings
        minLength - the minimum length the strings shall have
        Returns:
        List containing the Strings found

      • readASCIIStrings

        public static java.util.List<java.lang.String> readASCIIStrings(java.io.File file,
                                                                int minLength)
        Reads all 1-byte (ASCII) based character-strings contained in the file. Only printable ASCII characters are determined as string.

        Parameters:
        file - the file that is to be searched for strings
        minLength - the minimum length the strings shall have
        Returns:
        List containing the Strings found

        Reads all 2-byte (Unicode) based character-strings contained in the file. Only printable ASCII characters are determined as string.
